title: Kurwin's Cauteriser
content:
targeted a well-liked tavern owner that he was ratted out to the law. Scimitar Light Finesse 1.35 65

Kurwin's Cauteriser

1d6+1 Slashing+ 1d4 Fire

Cauteriser: Deals an additional 1~4 Fire damage.

On a hit, the target starts Burning unless it succeeds a Constitution Saving Throw.

Weapon Enchantment +1

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:
